contract.name: ASAStakingContract
contract.desc:
ASA Staking Contract for Algorand with Fixed Weekly Reward Pool

This contract allows users to:
- Stake an ASA token
- Earn proportional rewards from a fixed weekly pool of 100,000 tokens
- Add to their stake at any time
- Withdraw part or all of their stake at any time
- Claim rewards at any time
- Dynamic APY that adjusts based on total staked amount

This implementation uses box storage to store user staking information
and an accumulator pattern for gas-efficient reward distribution

methods.name: getUserStakeInfo
methods.desc: Helper function to read user stake info from box storage

methods.name: storeUserStakeInfo
methods.desc: Helper function to store user stake info in box storage

methods.name: initialize
methods.desc: Initialize the contract with the ASA token ID and other parameters

methods.name: optInToAsset
methods.desc: Opt the contract into the ASA

methods.name: stake
methods.desc:
Stake tokens
Requires a companion ASA transfer transaction
Automatically claims pending rewards

methods.name: withdraw
methods.desc:
Withdraw staked tokens
Automatically claims pending rewards

methods.name: addRewards
methods.desc:
Add rewards to the reward pool
Only the admin can call this
Requires a companion ASA transfer transaction with the rewards

methods.name: getCurrentAPY
methods.desc: Calculate current APY based on total staked amount

methods.name: getPendingRewards
methods.desc: Get pending rewards for a specific user

methods.name: triggerRewardDistribution
methods.desc:
Trigger reward distribution manually (admin only)
Updates accumulated rewards per share if period has passed
and compounds rewards for all stakers

methods.name: updateAdmin
methods.desc:
Update the admin address
Only the current admin can call this

methods.name: getUserStats
methods.desc: Get current staking statistics for a user

methods.name: emergencyWithdrawRewards
methods.desc: Emergency withdraw rewards from pool (admin only)

methods.name: deleteUserBox
methods.desc:
Delete a user's box (for cleanup)
Can only be called by the box owner or admin
